snippet: A federal program intended to improve public safety by deporting unauthorized immigrants convicted of crimes had no effect on the crime rate.
abstract: Editorial criticizes Secure Communities, federal initiative begun by Pres George W Bush and expanded by Pres Obama, under which everyone arrested by local police has his or her immigration status checked; contends program, which has done nothing to reduce crime nationwide, unduly punishes noncitizens who are valid members of their communities, reduces safety and adds to immigrant-directed hostilities.
lead_paragraph: A federal program intended to improve public safety by deporting unauthorized immigrants convicted of crimes had no effect on the crime rate.
